name: filesystem-server
description: A safe file system MCP server with sandboxed operations
long_description: This extension provides secure file system operations within a sandboxed directory. It includes tools for reading, writing, listing, creating directories, and deleting files while ensuring all operations are contained within the configured sandbox path for security.

tools.name: list_files
tools.description: List files and directories in a given path

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file

read_only.title: Read Only Mode
read_only.description: Enable read-only mode to prevent writes
